<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157644</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3297</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">English for a student with hearing loss</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch für einen Kursteilnehmer mit Verlust 
der Hörfähigkeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'anglais pour un étudiant avec la perte 
d'audition</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês para um estudante com perda de hearing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese per un allievo con perdita della 
capacità uditiva</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά για έναν σπουδαστή με την απώλεια ακοής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inglés para un estudiante con pérdida de oído</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Thiswritten guide for teachers deals with strategies to be used for difficulties which arise for English learners with hearing disabilities.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">deafness</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hearing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">loss of hearing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning strategies.</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thiswritten Anleitung für Lehrer beschäftigt 
die für Schwierigkeiten verwendet zu werden Strategien,, die für 
englische Anfänger mit Hörunfähigkeiten entstehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le guide de Thiswritten pour des professeurs 
traite des stratégies à utiliser pour les difficultés qui 
surgissent pour les étudiants anglais avec des incapacités par perte
d'audition.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A guia de Thiswritten para professores trata das 
estratégias a ser usadas para as dificuldades que se levantam para 
learners ingleses com inabilidades de hearing.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La guida di Thiswritten per gli insegnanti si 
occupa delle strategie da usare per le difficoltà che presentano per 
i principianti inglesi con le perdite della capacità uditiva.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο οδηγός Thiswritten για τους δασκάλους εξετάζει τις
στρατηγικές που χρησιμοποιούνται για τις δυσκολίες που προκύπτουν 
για τους αγγλικούς αρχαρίους με ειδικές ανάγκες ακρόασης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La guía de Thiswritten para los profesores se 
ocupa de las estrategias que se utilizarán para las dificultades que 
se presentan para los principiantes ingleses con inhabilidades de 
audiencia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Taubheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hörfähigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verlust der Hörfähigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lernenstrategien.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">surdité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">audition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">perte d'audition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">stratégies d'étude.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">deafness</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">hearing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">perda de hearing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estratégias de aprendizagem.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sordità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">udienza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">perdita dell'udienza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">strategie di apprendimento.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κώφωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ακρόαση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">απώλεια ακρόασης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στρατηγικές εκμάθησης.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inglés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sordera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">audiencia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">pérdida auditiva el oído</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estrategias que aprenden.</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
